signInToComment: Sign in to add a comment.
failedAddComment: Failed to add comment. Please try again.
verificationEmailSent: We sent a verification link to {{email}}. Please verify your email, then sign in.
couldNotSendVerification: Could not send verification email. Please try again later.
displayNameTooLong: Display name must be at most 30 characters.
couldNotUpdateName: Could not update name. Please try again later.
couldNotUpdatePhoto: Could not update profile photo. Please try again later.
couldNotUpdateFollow: Could not update follow. Please try again.
selectAChat: Select a chat to start messaging.
displayNameRequired: Display name is required and must be at most 30 characters.
usernameRules: Username can use letters, numbers, . and _. Max 30 chars, no consecutive dots or trailing dot.
usernameCheckFailed: Could not check username availability. Please try again.
passwordMin: Password should be at least 6 characters.

auth.invalidEmail: Please enter a valid email address.
auth.userNotFound: We couldn't find an account with that email.
auth.userDisabled: This account has been disabled. Contact support if this is an error.
auth.tooManyRequests: Too many attempts. Please wait a bit and try again.
auth.networkRequestFailed: Network error. Please check your connection and try again.
auth.emailAlreadyInUse: There is already an account with this email.
auth.weakPassword: Password is too weak. Use at least 6 characters.
auth.popupClosedByUser: Sign-in was canceled before it was completed.
auth.cancelledPopupRequest: Another sign-in popup was already open.
auth.popupBlocked: Popup was blocked by your browser. Allow popups and try again.
auth.accountExistsWithDifferentCredential: An account already exists with the same email but different sign-in method.
auth.credentialAlreadyInUse: Those credentials are already used by another account.
auth.timeout: The request timed out. Please try again.
auth.generic: Something went wrong. Please try again.
